mapper.select: SELECT publishQuestionnaire.id FROM publishQuestionnaire LEFT JOIN teacher ON publishQuestionnaire.teacherAccountId = teacher.accountId LEFT JOIN profession ON profession.id = teacher.professionId WHERE profession.facultyId = #{facultyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND publishQuestionnaire.`year` = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND publishQuestionnaire.semester = #{semester,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
